description: Construction of a single storey outbuilding to the rear of property for use as storage/ utility/ lounge and gym (following removal of rear access gate and demolition of existing outbuilding)
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Proposed Floor Plans Rec. 1/7/2021, d Proposed Site Plan Rec. 1/7/2021, Proposed Elevation 1 (front and rear) Rec. 1/7/2021, Proposed Elevation 2 (Left and Right Side) and email received 1/7/2021 confirming that the existing car port will be replaced by a pergola
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).

| The proposed detached rear outbuilding shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the development hereby approved, and shall not be used for habitable accommodation, as an independent dwelling or any industrial, commercial or business use.

REASON: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 & D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019) - Section 12.
